body.p:
Auditors office Ky.
Frankfort Septr 1863.
Govr Bramlette
Dear Sir.

The state has a judgement ^by the Franklin Circuit Court,^ against Ben Botts Sheriff of Fleming County, and his Sureties for a balance are upon the revenue of Fleming Co for 1862. of $2073 68/100 principal, $414.73 Damages and $7 45/100 Costs of Sev't. The Sheriff has paid the pricial and costs &c as required by law, and beliving that his case is one for Executive Clemency I respectfully ask that you will remit the Damages of $414 73/100.
Remit the damages above stated Sept 14th 1863

Franklin
Cir Ct
vs
Ben Botts
$414.73 damages
14th Sept/63
